title: Quick reference
body: > * The number of exchanges from which InterTrader gathered data for the pair > * The difference between the lowest and highest buy price across all exchanges > * The difference between the lowest and highest sell price across all exchanges * The potential profit at the time the price was retrieved by InterTrader â€” if *greyed out*, it means there's a problem with the coin or trading pair on at least one exchange * There is a problem with the coin or the trading pair on one or more exchanges * _Updated..._ How long since the prices for the coin were updated
